Pump.title: Isolate Pump
Pump.instruction: Close the inlet and outlet valves to isolate the pump.

Pump.title: Drain Fluid
Pump.instruction: Open the drain plug to release fluid.
Pump.warning: Wear gloves to avoid contact with chemicals.

Pump.title: Remove Cover
Pump.instruction: Unscrew bolts and lift the pump cover.

Pump.title: Replace Gasket
Pump.instruction: Remove and replace the pump gasket.
Pump.warning: Ensure no debris is left behind.

Pump.title: Reassemble
Pump.instruction: Place cover and tighten bolts evenly.

Motor.title: Disconnect Power
Motor.instruction: Shut off and verify motor power is off.

Motor.title: Open Housing
Motor.instruction: Unscrew housing to access motor internals.

Motor.title: Clean Interior
Motor.instruction: Use air blower to clean motor interior.

Motor.title: Reassemble
Motor.instruction: Close motor housing and restore power.
